item.title: Solved please close
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Uhh… This is what I have:

[code=java]
if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 0) && !IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && !inFunPk() && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
youdied();
killerz.rating += 25;
killerz.kills += 1;
killerz.killStreak += 1;
killmessage();

	killerz.getStreak();
	//killerz.lastKill = playerName; 
	//killerz.lastKillIp = playerLastConnect;
	//killerz.sameIpKill = killerz.playerLastConnect;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	if (killStreak >= 5) {
	killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+" and gained 100 PkPts");
	killerz.rating += 85;
	yell("After droping "+playerName+" like a rock, "+killerz.playerName+" got his reward.");
	yell(""+killerz.playerName+" now has "+killerz.rating+" Pk Points and "+killerz.kills+" kills");
	}		updateRating();
	if (killStreak >= 25 && (killStreak < 50)) {
	killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+" and gained 250 PkPts");
	killerz.rating += 235;
	yell(""+killerz.playerName+" now has "+killerz.rating+" Pk Points and "+killerz.kills+" kills");		
	}		updateRating();
	if (killStreak >= 50) {
	killerz.rating += 335;
	killerz.sM(""+playerName+" Has Fallen To The Wraith Of Your Blade");
	yell(""+killerz.playerName+" Has Just Ended The Almighty Kill Streak Of "+playerName+"");
	}
	}
	updateRating();
	
	if (inRogueArea() && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
	client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
	killerz.score += 2;
	rogueKillMessage();
	if(playerRights == 2) {
	killerz.sM("Killed Admin Bonus +5");
	killerz.score += 5;
	if(playerRights == 3) {
	killerz.sM("Killed Owner Bonus +10");
	killerz.score += 10;
	}
	}
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}		updateRating();[/code]
